stream.query.operator

Class Operator

  • java.lang.Object
    • stream.query.operator.Operator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JoinOperator, PrintOperator, ProjectionOperator, SelectionOperator, UnionOperator

    public abstract class Operator
extends java.lang.Object
    An Operator processes Tuples and produces Tuples.
    Author:
    Jeong-Hyon Hwang (jhh@cs.albany.edu)

      Connects the specified port of the specified Operator to the output of this Operator.
